title: Overnight stay
author: sexyrexyCheshire
text: Greated warmly and given directions to our room...large room with plenty of light.... however; the brd was hard and pillows flat....asked for a quiet room ( note from past reviews some rooms noisy ) however we were put in a from room ans we were woken up at 6.45am by a road sweeper (not good at all) as this is a weather lodge we had breakfast. .. thus ordered we sat down to wait. .. it came with the extra items we had ordered but most of it was cool and the fried eggs were hard... the spare plate we requested was cold it all went back .. I fresh one soon papered (all to very soon to be honest) minus the extra items we originally ordered (black pudding) this to was almost cold back it went an a refund was requested (no problem ) but this does get the day off to a bad start on check out we handed the keys in and it took the receptionist all her time to say " thanks " for the keys... what an unfriendly marked difference in the two receptionists, one very friendly and the order could hardly be bothered. won't be going back.
